00014 class attribute_iterator
00015 {
00016 public:
00017 
00018         typedef std::forward_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00019         typedef attribute value_type;
00020         typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00021         typedef attribute* pointer;
00022         typedef attribute& reference;
00023 
00024         attribute_iterator(const attribute_iterator& other)
00025                 : m_type(other.m_type)
00026                 , m_pos(other.m_pos)
00027         { }
00028 
00029         attribute_iterator& operator=(const attribute_iterator& rhs)
00030         {
00031                 m_type = rhs.m_type;
00032                 m_pos = rhs.m_pos;
00033                 return *this;
00034         }
00035 
00036         const attribute& operator*() const
00037         {
00038                 return *m_type->_get_attribute(m_pos);
00039         }
00040 
00041         const type& get_type() const { return *m_type; }
00042 
00043         const attribute* operator->() const { return &this->operator*(); }
00044 
00045         bool operator==(const attribute_iterator& rhs) const { return (m_type == rhs.m_type && m_pos == rhs.m_pos); }
00046 
00047         bool operator!=(const attribute_iterator& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00048 
00049         attribute_iterator& operator++()
00050         {
00051                 ASSERT_STRICT(m_pos != m_type->_attribute_count());
00052                 ++m_pos;
00053                 return *this;
00054         }
00055 
00056         attribute_iterator operator++(int)
00057         {
00058                 attribute_iterator ret(*this);
00059                 ++*this;
00060                 return ret;
00061         }
00062 
00063 private:
00064         friend class type;
00065         attribute_iterator(const type& t, size_t pos = 0)
00066                 : m_type(&t)
00067                 , m_pos(pos)
00068         { }
00069 
00070         const type* m_type;
00071         size_t m_pos;
00072 };

00075 
00076 attribute_iterator attributes_begin() const { return attribute_iterator(*this); }
00077 attribute_iterator attributes_end() const { return attribute_iterator(*this, _attribute_count()); }
